00007 #include "PIDController.h"
00008 #include "Notifier.h"
00009 #include "PIDSource.h"
00010 #include "PIDOutput.h"
00011 #include <math.h>
00012 #include "Synchronized.h"
00023 PIDController::PIDController(float Kp, float Ki, float Kd,
00024                                 PIDSource *source, PIDOutput *output,
00025                                 float period) :
00026     m_semaphore (0)
00027 {
00028     m_semaphore = semBCreate(SEM_Q_PRIORITY, SEM_FULL);
00029 
00030     m_controlLoop = new Notifier(PIDController::CallCalculate, this);
00031     
00032     
00033     m_P = Kp;
00034     m_I = Ki;
00035     m_D = Kd;
00036     m_maximumOutput = 1.0;
00037     m_minimumOutput = -1.0;
00038     
00039     m_maximumInput = 0;
00040     m_minimumInput = 0;
00041     
00042     m_continuous = false;
00043     m_enabled = false;
00044     m_setpoint = 0;
00045 
00046     m_prevError = 0;
00047     m_totalError = 0;
00048     m_tolerance = .05;
00049 
00050     m_result = 0;
00051     
00052     m_pidInput = source;
00053     m_pidOutput = output;
00054     m_period = period;
00055 
00056     m_controlLoop->StartPeriodic(m_period);
00057 }
00058 
00062 PIDController::~PIDController()
00063 {
00064     semFlush(m_semaphore);
00065     delete m_controlLoop;
00066 }
00067 
00075 void PIDController::CallCalculate(void *controller)
00076 {
00077     PIDController *control = (PIDController*) controller;
00078     control->Calculate();
00079 }
00080 
00086 void PIDController::Calculate()
00087 {
00088     bool enabled;
00089     PIDSource *pidInput;
00090 
00091     CRITICAL_REGION(m_semaphore)
00092     {
00093         if (m_pidInput == 0) return;
00094         if (m_pidOutput == 0) return;
00095         enabled = m_enabled;
00096         pidInput = m_pidInput;
00097     }
00098     END_REGION;
00099 
00100     if (enabled)
00101     {
00102         float input = pidInput->PIDGet();
00103         float result;
00104         PIDOutput *pidOutput;
00105 
00106         CRITICAL_REGION(m_semaphore)
00107         {
00108             m_error = m_setpoint - input;
00109             if (m_continuous)
00110             {
00111                 if (fabs(m_error) > (m_maximumInput - m_minimumInput) / 2)
00112                 {
00113                     if (m_error > 0)
00114                     {
00115                         m_error = m_error - m_maximumInput + m_minimumInput;
00116                     }
00117                     else
00118                     {
00119                         m_error = m_error + m_maximumInput - m_minimumInput;
00120                     }
00121                 }
00122             }
00123 
00124             if (((m_totalError + m_error) * m_I < m_maximumOutput) &&
00125                     ((m_totalError + m_error) * m_I > m_minimumOutput))
00126             {
00127                 m_totalError += m_error;
00128             }
00129 
00130             m_result = m_P * m_error + m_I * m_totalError + m_D * (m_error - m_prevError);
00131             m_prevError = m_error;
00132 
00133             if (m_result > m_maximumOutput) m_result = m_maximumOutput;
00134             else if (m_result < m_minimumOutput) m_result = m_minimumOutput;
00135 
00136             pidOutput = m_pidOutput;
00137             result = m_result;
00138         }
00139         END_REGION;
00140 
00141         pidOutput->PIDWrite(result);
00142     }
00143 }

00241 void PIDController::SetInputRange(float minimumInput, float maximumInput)
00242 {
00243     CRITICAL_REGION(m_semaphore)

00246         m_maximumInput = maximumInput;  
00247     }
00248     END_REGION;
00249 
00250     SetSetpoint(m_setpoint);
00251 }

00268 
00273 void PIDController::SetSetpoint(float setpoint)
00274 {
00275     CRITICAL_REGION(m_semaphore)
00276     {
00277         if (m_maximumInput > m_minimumInput)
00278         {
00279             if (setpoint > m_maximumInput)
00280                 m_setpoint = m_maximumInput;
00281             else if (setpoint < m_minimumInput)
00282                 m_setpoint = m_minimumInput;
00283             else
00284                 m_setpoint = setpoint;
00285         }
00286         else
00287         {
00288             m_setpoint = setpoint;
00289         }
00290     }
00291     END_REGION; 
00292 }
00293

00304     }
00305     END_REGION;
00306     return setpoint;

00324 /*
00325  * Set the percentage error which is considered tolerable for use with
00326  * OnTarget.
00327  * @param percentage error which is tolerable
00328  */
00329 void PIDController::SetTolerance(float percent)
00330 {
00331     CRITICAL_REGION(m_semaphore)
00332     {
00333         m_tolerance = percent;
00334     }
00335     END_REGION;
00336 }
00337 
00338 /*
00339  * Return true if the error is within the percentage of the total input range,
00340  * determined by SetTolerance. This asssumes that the maximum and minimum input
00341  * were set using SetInput.
00342  */
00343 bool PIDController::OnTarget()
00344 {
00345     bool temp;
00346     CRITICAL_REGION(m_semaphore)
00347     {
00348         temp = fabs(m_error) < (m_tolerance / 100 * 
00349             (m_maximumInput - m_minimumInput));
00350     }
00351     END_REGION;
00352     return temp;
00353 }

00358 void PIDController::Enable()
00359 {
00360     CRITICAL_REGION(m_semaphore)
00361     {           
00362         m_enabled = true;
00363     }
00364     END_REGION; 
00365 }
00369 void PIDController::Disable()
00370 {
00371     CRITICAL_REGION(m_semaphore)
00372     {
00373         m_pidOutput->PIDWrite(0);
00374         m_enabled = false;
00375     }
00376     END_REGION;
00377 }

00388     }

00390     return enabled;

00396 void PIDController::Reset()
00397 {
00398     Disable();
00399 
00400     CRITICAL_REGION(m_semaphore)
00401     {
00402         m_prevError = 0;
00403         m_totalError = 0;
00404         m_result = 0;
00405     }
00406     END_REGION;
00407 }
